page.label: Page
page.description: Used for anything on a page that is not an action.

action.label: Action
action.description: Used for primary actions on a page.

secondaryAction.label: Secondary Action
secondaryAction.description: Used for secondary actions on a page.

info.label: Info
info.description: Used for informative elements on a page.

success.label: Success
success.description: Used for success messages and positive feedback.

warning.label: Warning
warning.description: Used for warning messages and alerts.

danger.label: Danger
danger.description: Used for error messages and negative feedback.

dataViz.label: Data Viz
dataViz.description: Used for data visualization and charts.
